jdbcService.sql: insert into node_addresses ( id, created, modified, x, y, street, city, post_code, country, province, additional, number, district, priority, address_type_id, sector, node_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :x, :y, :street, :city, :postCode, :country, :province, :additional, :number, :district, :priority, :addressTypeId, :sector, :nodeId )
